Full service R&D platform for microbe-based biomanufacturing - process optimization, scale-up, scale-down, mass balancing, and technology transfer

Work with our experts

With over 15 years of industry experience, our staff is here to support a wide range of projects, from academic proof-of-concept scale-ups to production demonstrations for startups.

Innovative

We like to try new things but your IP is always yours.

Fermentation capacity
Mini benchtop : 0.2 L (8 units) coming soon
Small benchtop : 3 L (4 units), 5 L, 15 L (2 units), 20 L (2 units)
Steam-in-place : 10 L, 100 L, 200 L coming soon
Downstream Processing
Batch centrifugation up to 16L; continuous centrifugation coming soon; tangential flow filtration; spray drying; lyophilization
Measurements
Dry cell weight; microscopy; HPLC-RI/UV or -MS for carbohydrates, organic acids, metabolites; Bradford assay and SDS-PAGE for protein
Organisms we have worked with
Bacteria : Pseudomonas, Lactobacillus, E. coli, C. necator, Enterococcus faecium, B. thuringiensis, B. licheniformis
Yeast : P. pastoris, S. cerevisiae, K. marxianus, T. asahii, Methylotrophic yeasts
Fungi : A. niger, T. viride, P. indica, Melanocarpus albomyces, Termitomyces sp. OE147
Products we have experience with
Biopolymers, biofertilizers, biopesticides, biofuels, recombinant proteins, Insulin, enzymes, acids, plasmid DNA, biological controls
Modes and Control
Batch, Fed-Batch, Continuous
Dissolved oxygen/agitation, pH, temperature, off-gas

Competitive pricing for startups and academics alike
